name: Crosshub
short_description:
Enables multi-way analysis of RNA-Seq, miRNA-Seq and methylome data provided in The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA).
Crosshub performs:
1. methylation profiling analysis
2. differential expression analysis (RNA-seq and miRNA-seq)
3. CpG-methylation vs. gene expression correlations
4. miRNA expression vs. gene expression correlations + TargetScan predictions
5. Genes and transcription factors (TF) expression correlation analysis coupled with ENCODE ChIP-Seq TF-gene binding data and Jaspar TF binding site predictions

Generates Excel summaries.

Python 3.4 or later is required (Anaconda is recommended).
summary: The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) multi-way analysis

screenshots.caption: Methylation profiling and ENCODE chromatin state of CpG site regions
Methylation profiling and correlations with expression
Gene - transcription factor expression correlations. ENCODE ChIP-Seq gene-TF binding events and Jaspar TF binding sites predictions are provided
Gene - transcription factor expression correlations. ENCODE ChIP-Seq gene-TF binding events are described
miRNA-vs-genes expression profiling. TargetScan, DIANA microT, mirSVR, miRTarBase, PicTar predictions are provided
